short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Lens-like extension using GPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨AI-Powered Text Extraction & Smart GPT Responses – All in One Click!✨

🚀 Supercharge your Chrome browser with MyGPTLens, a powerful extension that combines AI-driven Optical Character Recognition (OCR) with GPT-based smart text analysis. Effortlessly extract text from images and receive instant AI responses without switching tabs or applications. Perfect for researchers, students, professionals, or anyone seeking to streamline workflows using AI technology.

🔑Key Features:

🔍Instant OCR Text Extraction: Right-click on any image to extract text seamlessly with built-in OCR technology.
🤖AI-Powered Responses: Automatically analyze and process extracted text using OpenAI’s GPT to generate insightful responses and summaries.
🫂Enhanced User Experience: Sleek and responsive sidebar interface to view extracted text alongside AI-generated insights.
🖼️Broad Image Compatibility: Works with screenshots, scanned documents, and other image formats, making it ideal for diverse tasks.
💪Boost Efficiency & Productivity: Reduce repetitive tasks and simplify information processing with automated AI features.

⚒️How It Works:

👆Right-click on any image and select "Extract Text & Send to GPT."
💻The extracted text appears in the extension’s sidebar.
📟Instantly receive AI-generated responses, summaries, or explanations using GPT.
🛜Download now and elevate your productivity with MyGPTLens – the ultimate combination of AI text extraction and smart responses!
